DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare Symbicort in a pressurized metered-dose inhaler (pMDI) with formoterol and placebo in the long-term maintenance treatment of patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Symbicort® pMDI 2 x 160/4.5 μg Bid and 2 x 80/4.5 μg Bid With Formoterol Turbuhaler® 2 x 4.5 μg Bid and Placebo in Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: A clinical diagnosis of COPD with symptoms for more than 2 years. Smoking history of 10 or more pack years A history of at least one COPD exacerbation requiring a course of oral steroids and/or antibiotics within 112 months before first visit. A history of asthma Patients taking oral steroids Any significant disease or disorder that may jeopardize the safety of the patient
